name: SpringOne Conference retro
body:
1. Spring 4.1
 * https://spring.io/blog/2014/09/04/spring-framework-4-1-ga-is-here
 * groovy markup templates
 
2. Spring Boot
 *
3. Groovy android
4. Numa interleaving - less cpu
5. Netflix 
 * Ribbon
 * Eureka 
 * Hytrix
6. yml configuration examples
7. Spring Cloud
8. Groovy puzzlers
9. Tests
 * Siege - http://freecode.com/projects/siege
 * Running many micro EC2 virtual instances for load test of web application shttps://github.com/newsapps/beeswithmachineguns
 * WBench is a tool that uses the HTML5 performance timing API to benchmark end user load times for websites. It simulates users visiting your website for the first time, with nothing of your site cached. https://github.com/desktoppr/wbench
10. Prezentation Hadoop with 1000 nodes
11. Venkat - http://agiledeveloper.com
12. Remote configuration - Zookeeper 
 * objects not properties
13. Exhibitor - https://github.com/Netflix/exhibitor/wiki
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
